Question.Subject: question about a scenario on ebay!?!!?!?
Question.Content:
so i have two ebay accounts and was wondering what happens if i do this?..........
on one of my ebay account i put up a listing of an item. Than on the other ebay account I buy it and than leave feedback while the other account does the same thing leaving feedback...therefore I will have feedback for both accounts...
will ebay find out about this??
Question.ChosenAnswer: Thats an expensive & foolish way of building up your feedback. High probability of ebay finding out & cancelling/restricting your accounts.(& for what? one measly feedback!)

Answer.Content: Yes eBay will find out they always do and you will more then likely be banned for it cause it is against the rules.
Answer.Reference: I knew someone who did that and they were banned with in a week.

Answer.Content: Thats an expensive & foolish way of building up your feedback. High probability of ebay finding out & cancelling/restricting your accounts.(& for what? one measly feedback!)
